originInfo.publisher: Administrative Office of the United States Courts

name.namePart: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Gabelman
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Connie J. Gabelman. It is ordered that: (1) The government's request for hearing on Rule 35(b) motion 36 is granted; (2) A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 34 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge at 1:00 p.m., Friday, January 6, 2006, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska;(3) At the request of the defendant through her counsel, and with the agreement of the government, the defendant may be absent from the hearing on the Rule 35 motion; (4) The Marshal is directed not to return the defendant to the district; and (5) The defendant is held to have waived her right to be present.***Rule 35 Motion Hearing set for 1/6/2006 01:00 PM in Courtroom 1 (Lincoln) before Judge Richard G. Kopf. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 12/8/2005. (KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Connie J. Gabelman. It is ordered that: (1) The government's request for hearing on Rule 35(b) motion 36 is granted; (2) A hearing on the government's motion for reduction of sentence pursuant to Rule 35(b) 34 has been set before the undersigned United States district judge at 1:00 p.m., Friday, January 6, 2006, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska;(3) At the request of the defendant through her counsel, and with the agreement of the government, the defendant may be absent from the hearing on the Rule 35 motion; (4) The Marshal is directed not to return the defendant to the district; and (5) The defendant is held to have waived her right to be present.***Rule 35 Motion Hearing set for 1/6/2006 01:00 PM in Courtroom 1 (Lincoln) before Judge Richard G. Kopf. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 12/8/2005. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Gabelman
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT on motion of the government after initial sentencing as to Connie J. Gabelman (1), Count 1 of the Indictment, on 1/6/06, defendant's sentence of imprisonment was reduced from the original sentence of imprisonment to a term of 30 months under the same terms and conditions of supervised release as previously set forth in the judgment and commitment order dated 3/10/04. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/6/2006. 4 certified copies to USM. (CCB )
